jobDescription: We are seeking a Part-Time Recruiter for our growing organization!  Responsibilities include, but are not limited to: Contacting potential study candidates using leads, which are provided by TKLConducting phone interviews with potential study candidates utilizing prepared customized phone screenersScheduling study candidates based on a thorough and acceptable phone interviewMaintaining accurate and current information on subject base Min High School Diploma. Strong communication skills are required. Must be bilingual (English/Spanish). This is an entry level opportunity with on-the-job training. Career re-entry applicants are welcome. We have a daytime shift available, Monday-Thursday 8:30-1:30 and Friday 8:30-1:00. This is an office-based position in Fair Lawn, NJ.
